review: I Love this,so simple to install and BAM your on! I only wish you would have made it possible to preorder more than 1. I would have brought 3 more for christmas! Well I'll save for next year, My family will LOVE this !This is a must have! My only concern is the stick does get very hot,solution unplug when not in use!

review: Set up was very easy.  System started right away and there have been no issues.  Have watched something every day since we received the stick.  Added a few games but I'm not really a gamer.  Been wanting a fish tank so I now have one from Amazon. Like the selection for TV and Movies and the picture and sound quality are very good.  Extremely happy with this purchase.

review: I was watching a movie in five minutes. I love it. Very responsive remote. I have tried to get the Firestick App to recognize it, but it has not worked yet.
